Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Nagaritha Drive, which runs east and west through town.
Room.LongDescription: To the north of Nagaritha Drive, you can see the Oceancrest Public Amphitheatre. There are two stages that you can see, but they can combine into one when a really large event takes place. Around dusk, most of the people come out from their day jobs and have dinner there among friends while being entertained by travelling minstrels and bards.
